ctx: intros R H x y HRxy.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable y (possible names are: R and x).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type

Goal:
forall R : relation T, well_order R -> forall x y : T, R x y -> ~ R y x

Premises:
Record well_order (R : relation T) : Prop := Build_well_order { wo_well_founded : well_founded R; wo_total_strict_order : total_strict_order R }
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [T : Type |- nat]
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
wo_irrefl : forall R : relation T, well_order R -> forall x : T, ~ R x x
ZornsLemmaForPreorders : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), preorder R -> (forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) -> exists x : T, premaximal R x
tower_is_chain : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> forall (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}), chain R (tower T R chain_sup inflation)
tower_sind : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (P : T -> SProp), (forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> (forall x : T, In S x -> P x) -> forall c : chain R S, P (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))) -> (forall x : T, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> P x -> P (proj1_sig (inflation x))) -> forall t : T, tower T R chain_sup inflation t -> P t
tower_ind : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (P : T -> Prop), (forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> (forall x : T, In S x -> P x) -> forall c : chain R S, P (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))) -> (forall x : T, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> P x -> P (proj1_sig (inflation x))) -> forall t : T, tower T R chain_sup inflation t -> P t
inflation_intro : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (x : T), In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) x -> In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (inflation x))
ZL' : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> (forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) -> (forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) -> False
sup_intro : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) (S : Ensemble T), Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) -> forall c : chain R S, In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (chain_sup S c))
chains_ord_exists : forall (T : Type) (R : relation T), order R -> (forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> exists x : T, forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) -> forall x : chains T R, (forall x0 : T, exists y : T, R x0 y /\ x0 <> y) -> exists y : chains T R, chains_ord T R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : chains T R, chains_ord T R x z -> chains_ord T R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)
Build_well_order : forall R : relation T, well_founded R -> total_strict_order R -> well_order R
wo_well_founded : forall R : relation T, well_order R -> well_founded R
wo_total_strict_order : forall R : relation T, well_order R -> total_strict_order R
Inductive tower (T : Type) (R : relation T) (chain_sup : forall S : Ensemble T, chain R S -> {x : T | (forall y : T, In S y -> R y x) /\ (forall z : T, (forall y : T, In S y -> R y z) -> R x z)}) (inflation : forall x : T, {y : T | R x y /\ x <> y /\ (forall z : T, R x z -> R z y -> z = x \/ z = y)}) : Ensemble T := sup_intro : forall S : Ensemble T, Included S (tower T R chain_sup inflation) ->...-> In (tower T R chain_sup inflation) (proj1_sig (inflation x)) Arguments tower _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope Arguments sup_intro _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope Arguments inflation_intro _%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
total_strict_order = fun R : relation T => forall x y : T, R x y \/ x = y \/ R y x : relation T -> Prop
premaximal = fun (T : Type) (R : relation T) (x : T) => forall y : T, R x y -> R y x : forall T : Type, relation T -> T -> Prop Arguments premaximal {T}%type_scope
chain = fun (T : Type) (R : relation T) (S : Ensemble T) => forall x y : T, In S x -> In S y -> R x y \/ R y x : forall T : Type, relation T -> Ensemble T -> Prop Arguments chain {T}%type_scope
maximal = fun (T : Type) (R : relation T) (x : T) => forall y : T, R x y -> x = y : forall T : Type, relation T -> T -> Prop Arguments maximal {T}%type_scope
Quotients.R_impl_equality_of_equiv_class : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence R -> forall x y : A, R x y -> Quotients.equiv_class R x = Quotients.equiv_class R y
Quotients.equality_of_equiv_class_impl_R : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A), equivalence R -> forall x y : A, Quotients.equiv_class R x = Quotients.equiv_class R y -> R x y
Inductive clos_refl_sym_trans (A : Type) (R : relation A) : relation A := rst_step : forall x y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y | rst_refl : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x x | rst_sym : forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y x | rst_trans : forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_refl _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_sym _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.rst_trans _%type_scope
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y \/ R y x -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x a -> P x a

```coq
intros R H x y HRxy.
intro Ryx.
apply wo_irrefl with (x := x) (y := y).
- exact H.
- split; assumption.
Qed.

original: intros R H x y HRxy. intro Ryx. apply wo_irrefl with (x := x) (y := y). - apply H. - split; auto.
